item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Alright, so I have a code for every time the mouse is clicked, for it to find the mouse coords and print them. This is what I have:

	private MouseInfo mInfo;
	private PointerInfo pInfo;
	private Point point = new Point();
	private double pointX = 0d;
	private double pointY = 0d;
//body here

	public void mouseExited(MouseEvent event) {
	}

	public void mouseEntered(MouseEvent event) {
	}

	public void mouseReleased(MouseEvent event) {
	}

	public void mousePressed(MouseEvent event) {
		pInfo = mInfo.getPointerInfo();
		point = pInfo.getLocation();
			
		pointX = point.getX();
		pointY = point.getY();
			
		System.out.println("pointer is at: (" + (int)pointX + ", " + (int)pointY + ")");
	}

	public void mouseClicked(MouseEvent event) {
	}

//end of class..

well can someone tell me what is wrong!?

Read full topic
